about_the_game:
Enter the game world of Castle of Deceit to explore this magical outer planet, and experience first-person shooting combat. Use different weapons to deal with different dangers, and try to protect yourself!

Story background

The story takes place on an alien planet, where surviving humans come here as aliens and discover that the hegemon of this planet retains the ruling ideology of divide and rule, realizing that tragedies on Earth can also occur on this planet. Players will explore the secrets of the planet from the perspective of the protagonist looking for his lover.

Game status

This is a small independent game that has not yet been developed. At present, only the first chapter has been completed. Most of the game mechanisms can be experienced and include a Boss battle.

Follow-up planning

Add the next game scenario, add more guns, modules, grenades, etc., and may also be restructured as a whole. Please take the actual added content as the standard.

Purchase Guide

This game has a free trial version, and the content that can be experienced is completely consistent with the ontology. Currently, you can play the first chapter. You can only download the trial version to experience all the current content of this game without paying any fees, so please purchase this game only for the sake of encouraging or helping game developers.

name: Castle of Deceit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: wind7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: wind7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Castle of Deceit is a first-person shooting battle game that takes place on an alien planet. You will play the leading role in finding the weak truth in the quagmire of lies and make your decision to find your lover.
